attributes.action: Include an option for None of the above on all UK ballot papers
attributes.additional_details: Pass a law to ensure all future ballot papers for all elections, general and local, and referendums have a option for None of the Above. This should be on all UK votes, including proportional representation elections in Northern Ireland
attributes.background: Include an option for None of the Above on all UK ballot papers for local and general elections and any referendums. Elections would cease to be a binary choice. This would possibly encourage more people to vote.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/325459
